spell_tooltip.description:
Attack with your off-hand, dealing 72,630 Physical damage, dispelling all enrage effects and applying a concentrated form of your active Non-Lethal poison.

Awards 1 combo point.
Blinds all enemies near the target, causing them to wander disoriented for 18 sec. Damage may interrupt the effect. Limit 1.
Provides a moment of magic immunity, instantly removing all harmful spell effects. The cloak lingers, causing you to resist harmful spells for 5 sec.
Increases your dodge chance by 100% for 10 sec.
Blind has 47% reduced cooldown, 70% reduced duration, and applies to all nearby enemies.
Grappling Hook has 1 additional charge.
Fatal attacks instead reduce you to 7% of your maximum health. For 3 sec afterward, you take 85% reduced damage. Cannot trigger more often than once per 6 min.
Redirects all threat you cause to the targeted party or raid member, beginning with your next damaging attack within the next 30 sec and lasting 1 hour.
Energy cost of Feint and Crimson Vial reduced by 10.
Reduces the cooldown of Sprint by 60 sec.
While Stealth or Shadow Dance is active, you move 20% faster.
Movement speed increased by 15%.
Increases the healing you receive from Crimson Vial, healing potions, and healthstones by 25%.
Sprint increases movement speed by an additional 30% and has 4 sec increased duration.
The Energy costs of Kidney Shot, Cheap Shot, Sap, and Distract are reduced by 20%.
Coats your weapons with a Non-Lethal Poison that lasts for 1 hour. Each strike has a 30% chance of poisoning the enemy, reducing their damage by 3.0% for 10 sec.
Physical damage taken reduced by 5%.
Feint has 1 additional charge.
Increases the critical strike chance of your attacks that generate combo points by 5%.
Auto-attacks increase auto-attack damage and movement speed by 1.0% for 3 sec, stacking up to 10%.
Energy cost of finishing moves reduced by 6%.
Slice and Dice heals you for up to 1% of your maximum health per 3 sec.
Your finishing moves have a 10% chance per combo point to grant 1% Haste for 15 sec, stacking up to 5 times.
You are healed for 30% of your maximum health over 6 sec after activating Vanish.

Roll the Bones supercharges 2 combo points.

Damaging finishing moves consume a supercharged combo point to function as if they spent 2 additional combo points.

Abilities requiring Stealth can be used for 6 sec after Stealth breaks.

Combat benefits requiring Stealth persist for an additional 6 sec after Stealth breaks.
Increase the bonus granted when a damaging finishing move consumes a supercharged combo point by 1.

Gain 1 additional max combo point.

Your finishing moves that consume more than 5 combo points have increased effects, and your finishing moves deal 5% increased damage.
Vanish has 1 additional charge.
Sinister Strike has a 35% chance to hit an additional time, making your next Pistol Shot half cost and double damage.
Increases your Energy regeneration rate by 50%, your maximum Energy by 50, and your attack speed by 20% for 20 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Grappling Hook by 15 sec, and increases its retraction speed.
Increases your Energy regeneration rate by 30%.
Stamina increased by 5%.
Movement speed increased by 15%.
Restless Blades now also reduces the remaining cooldown of Evasion and Feint by 0.5 sec per combo point spent.
Between the Eyes and Pistol Shot have 10 yd increased range, and Pistol Shot reduces the the target's damage done to you by 5%.

Gain 1 additional max combo point.

Your finishing moves that consume more than 5 combo points have increased effects, and your finishing moves deal 5% increased damage.

Finishing move that teleports to an enemy within 10 yds, striking with both weapons for Physical damage. Number of strikes increased per combo point.

100% of damage taken during effect is delayed, instead taken over 8 sec.

   1 point  : 494,933 over 0.33 sec
   2 points: 742,400 over 0.67 sec
   3 points: 989,866 over 1.00 sec
   4 points: 1.2 million over 1.33 sec
   5 points: 1.4 million over 1.66 sec
   6 points: 1.7 million over 2.00 sec
   7 points: 1.9 million over 2.33 sec
Your off-hand attacks have a 50% chance to generate 10 Energy.
Half-cost uses of Pistol Shot granted by Sinister Strike now generate 1 additional combo point, and deal 20% additional damage.
Blade Flurry's initial damage is increased by 100% and generates 1 combo point per target struck.
Your finishing moves have a 20% chance per combo point spent to grant a combo point.
Roll the Bones has a 20% increased chance of granting additional matches.
Versatility increased by 3%.
Critical strikes with Between the Eyes deal four times normal damage.
Sinister Strike has a 15% chance to strike with both weapons after it strikes an additional time.
Generate full combo points when you gain Adrenaline Rush, and full Energy when it ends.
Blade Flurry strikes 3 additional enemies and its duration is increased by 3 sec.

Blade Flurry does not lose duration during Adrenaline Rush.

Adrenaline Rush does not lose duration while Stealthed.
Ambush, Sinister Strike, and Dispatch have a 15% chance to grant you a Roll the Bones combat enhancement buff you do not already have for 8 sec.
Between the Eyes has a 5% chance per combo point spent to grant 5 combo points.

When your Dispatch consumes 5 or more combo points, Dispatch deals 6% increased damage and costs 5 less Energy for 15 sec.

Max 5 stacks. Adding a stack does not refresh the duration.

When Sinister Strike strikes an additional time, gain 2 additional stacks of Opportunity. Max 6 stacks.

Half-cost uses of Pistol Shot consume 2 additional stacks of Opportunity to fire 2 additional shots. Additional shots generate 1 fewer combo point and deal 20% reduced damage.

Entering Stealth refreshes the cooldown of Between the Eyes.

Between the Eyes has no cooldown and also Dispatches the target for 50% of normal damage when used from Stealth.
Increase the remaining duration of your active Roll the Bones combat enhancements by 30 sec.

Strikes an enemy, dealing 283,054 Physical damage and causing the target to take 15% increased damage from your abilities for 12 sec.

Awards 1 combo point.

Sinister Strike and Ambush now also strike with an Unseen Blade dealing 438,553 damage. Targets struck are Fazed for 10 sec.

Fazed enemies take 5% more damage from you and cannot parry your attacks.

This effect may occur once every 20 sec.
Attacks that generate combo points deal 50% increased critical strike damage to Fazed targets.
You take 5% reduced damage from Fazed targets.

Unseen Blade and Killing Spree increase the damage of your finishing moves by 3% for 12 sec.

Multiple applications may overlap.
Tricks of the Trade's threat redirect duration is increased to 1 hour.
Killing Spree applies Fazed to any targets struck.
Slice and Dice grants 10% additional attack speed and gives your auto-attacks a chance to refresh your opportunity to strike with Unseen Blade.
Killing Spree has 10% reduced cooldown and allows your next 2 strikes of Unseen Blade to ignore its cooldown.
Finishing moves have 10% increased chance to critically strike Fazed targets.
Blade Flurry damage is increased by 25% while Flawless Form is active.

After 4 strikes with Unseen Blade, your next Dispatch will be performed as a Coup de Grace, functioning as if it had consumed 5 additional combo points.

If the primary target is Fazed, gain 5 stacks of Flawless Form.
Blinds all enemies near the target, causing them to wander disoriented for 18 sec. Damage may interrupt the effect. Limit 1.
Provides a moment of magic immunity, instantly removing all harmful spell effects. The cloak lingers, causing you to resist harmful spells for 5 sec.
Increases your dodge chance by 100% for 10 sec.
Blind has 47% reduced cooldown, 70% reduced duration, and applies to all nearby enemies.
Grappling Hook has 1 additional charge.
Increases the non-damaging effects of your weapon poisons by 20%.
Fatal attacks instead reduce you to 7% of your maximum health. For 3 sec afterward, you take 85% reduced damage. Cannot trigger more often than once per 6 min.
Redirects all threat you cause to the targeted party or raid member, beginning with your next damaging attack within the next 30 sec and lasting 1 hour.
Energy cost of Feint and Crimson Vial reduced by 10.
Reduces the cooldown of Sprint by 60 sec.
While Stealth or Shadow Dance is active, you move 20% faster.
Movement speed increased by 15%.
Increases the healing you receive from Crimson Vial, healing potions, and healthstones by 25%.
Sprint increases movement speed by an additional 30% and has 4 sec increased duration.
The Energy costs of Kidney Shot, Cheap Shot, Sap, and Distract are reduced by 20%.

Coats your weapons with a Non-Lethal Poison that lasts for 1 hour. Each strike has a 30% chance of poisoning the enemy, clouding their mind and slowing their attack and casting speed by 15% for 10 sec.
Physical damage taken reduced by 5%.
Feint has 1 additional charge.
Increases the critical strike chance of your attacks that generate combo points by 5%.
Auto-attacks increase auto-attack damage and movement speed by 1.0% for 3 sec, stacking up to 10%.
Ambush generates 1 additional combo point.
Slice and Dice heals you for up to 1% of your maximum health per 3 sec.
Your finishing moves have a 10% chance per combo point to grant 1% Haste for 15 sec, stacking up to 5 times.

Damaging finishing moves consume a supercharged combo point to function as if they spent 2 additional combo points.

Abilities requiring Stealth can be used for 6 sec after Stealth breaks.

Combat benefits requiring Stealth persist for an additional 6 sec after Stealth breaks.
Increase the bonus granted when a damaging finishing move consumes a supercharged combo point by 1.

Gain 1 additional max combo point.

Your finishing moves that consume more than 5 combo points have increased effects, and your finishing moves deal 5% increased damage.
Vanish has 1 additional charge.
Sinister Strike has a 35% chance to hit an additional time, making your next Pistol Shot half cost and double damage.
Increases your Energy regeneration rate by 50%, your maximum Energy by 50, and your attack speed by 20% for 20 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Grappling Hook by 15 sec, and increases its retraction speed.
Increases your Energy regeneration rate by 30%.
Stamina increased by 5%.
Movement speed increased by 15%.
Restless Blades now also reduces the remaining cooldown of Evasion and Feint by 0.5 sec per combo point spent.
Between the Eyes and Pistol Shot have 10 yd increased range, and Pistol Shot reduces the the target's damage done to you by 5%.

Gain 1 additional max combo point.

Your finishing moves that consume more than 5 combo points have increased effects, and your finishing moves deal 5% increased damage.

Finishing move that teleports to an enemy within 10 yds, striking with both weapons for Physical damage. Number of strikes increased per combo point.

100% of damage taken during effect is delayed, instead taken over 8 sec.

   1 point  : 498,392 over 0.33 sec
   2 points: 747,589 over 0.67 sec
   3 points: 996,785 over 1.00 sec
   4 points: 1.2 million over 1.33 sec
   5 points: 1.4 million over 1.66 sec
   6 points: 1.7 million over 2.00 sec
   7 points: 1.9 million over 2.33 sec
Your off-hand attacks have a 50% chance to generate 10 Energy.
Half-cost uses of Pistol Shot granted by Sinister Strike now generate 1 additional combo point, and deal 20% additional damage.
Your finishing moves have a 20% chance per combo point spent to grant a combo point.
Slice and Dice grants additional attack speed equal to 100% of your Haste.
Roll the Bones has a 20% increased chance of granting additional matches.
Versatility increased by 3%.
Critical strikes with Between the Eyes deal four times normal damage.

Half-cost uses of Pistol Shot have a 35% chance to make your next Ambush usable without Stealth.

Chance to trigger this effect matches the chance for your Sinister Strike to strike an additional time.
Generate full combo points when you gain Adrenaline Rush, and full Energy when it ends.
Blade Flurry strikes 3 additional enemies and its duration is increased by 3 sec.

Blade Flurry does not lose duration during Adrenaline Rush.

Adrenaline Rush does not lose duration while Stealthed.
Between the Eyes has a 5% chance per combo point spent to grant 5 combo points.
Blade Flurry damage is increased by an additional 5% per missing target below its maximum.
Haste increased by 10% while Stealthed and for 26 sec after breaking Stealth.

When Sinister Strike strikes an additional time, gain 2 additional stacks of Opportunity. Max 6 stacks.

Half-cost uses of Pistol Shot consume 2 additional stacks of Opportunity to fire 2 additional shots. Additional shots generate 1 fewer combo point and deal 20% reduced damage.
Effects that grant a chance for Sinister Strike to strike an additional time also apply to Ambush at 80% of their value.

Entering Stealth refreshes the cooldown of Between the Eyes.

Between the Eyes has no cooldown and also Dispatches the target for 50% of normal damage when used from Stealth.

Strikes an enemy, dealing 281,581 Physical damage and causing the target to take 15% increased damage from your abilities for 12 sec.

Awards 1 combo point.
Attacks that generate combo points deal 50% increased critical strike damage to Fazed targets.
You take 5% reduced damage from Fazed targets.

If the primary target is Fazed, gain 5 stacks of Flawless Form.
Creates a cloud of thick smoke in an 8 yard radius around the Rogue for 5 sec. Enemies are unable to target into or out of the smoke cloud.

Attack with your off-hand, dealing 73,427 Physical damage, dispelling all enrage effects and applying a concentrated form of your active Non-Lethal poison.

Awards 1 combo point.
Blinds all enemies near the target, causing them to wander disoriented for 18 sec. Damage may interrupt the effect. Limit 1.
Provides a moment of magic immunity, instantly removing all harmful spell effects. The cloak lingers, causing you to resist harmful spells for 5 sec.
Increases your dodge chance by 100% for 10 sec.
Grappling Hook has 1 additional charge.
Evasion also reduces damage taken by 20%, and Feint also reduces non-area-of-effect damage taken by 20%.
Redirects all threat you cause to the targeted party or raid member, beginning with your next damaging attack within the next 30 sec and lasting 1 hour.
Energy cost of Feint and Crimson Vial reduced by 10.
Reduces the cooldown of Sprint by 60 sec.
While Stealth or Shadow Dance is active, you move 20% faster.
The Energy costs of Kidney Shot, Cheap Shot, Sap, and Distract are reduced by 20%.
Auto-attacks increase auto-attack damage and movement speed by 1.0% for 3 sec, stacking up to 10%.
Ambush generates 1 additional combo point.

Abilities requiring Stealth can be used for 3 sec after Stealth breaks.

Combat benefits requiring Stealth persist for an additional 3 sec after Stealth breaks.

Backstab has 15% increased critical strike chance.

When you are behind your target, Backstab critical strikes now also expose a flaw in their defenses, applying Find Weakness for 10 sec.

Draws upon surrounding shadows to empower your weapons, causing your attacks to deal 20% additional damage as Shadow and causing your combo point generating abilities to generate full combo points for 16 sec.
Shuriken Storm has an additional 15% chance to crit, and its critical strikes apply Find Weakness for 10 sec.
Abilities cost 5% less Energy while Stealth or Shadow Dance is active.
Symbols of Death has 5 sec reduced cooldown.
Shadow Techniques generates 3 additional Energy.
Shadow Dance has 2 sec increased duration.
Your finishing moves generate 5 Energy per combo point spent.
After entering Stealth, your next combo point generating ability generates full combo points.
Symbols of Death increases your critical strike chance by 6%.
Eviscerate and Black Powder deal an additional 30% damage as Shadow to targets with your Find Weakness active.

Gain 1 additional max combo point.

Your finishing moves that consume more than 5 combo points have increased effects, and your finishing moves deal 5% increased damage.
Versatility increased by 3%.
Your finishing moves reduce the remaining cooldown on Shadow Dance by 0.5 sec per combo point spent.
Your abilities deal 5% increased magic damage.
Eviscerate and Black Powder increase your Shadow damage dealt by 8% for 8 sec.
Shadow Dance increases damage by an additional 30%.
Eviscerate, Rupture, and Black Powder increase the damage of the next use of the same finishing move by 15%.
Creates a cloud of thick smoke in an 8 yard radius around the Rogue for 5 sec. Enemies are unable to target into or out of the smoke cloud.
Casting Envenom with at least 5 combo points on a target afflicted by your Garrote, Rupture, and lethal poison deals 37,245 Nature damage, and reduces their movement speed by 90% for 2 sec.

Attack with your off-hand, dealing 73,443 Physical damage, dispelling all enrage effects and applying a concentrated form of your active Non-Lethal poison.

Awards 1 combo point.
Blinds all enemies near the target, causing them to wander disoriented for 18 sec. Damage may interrupt the effect. Limit 1.
Provides a moment of magic immunity, instantly removing all harmful spell effects. The cloak lingers, causing you to resist harmful spells for 5 sec.
Increases your dodge chance by 100% for 10 sec.
Grappling Hook has 1 additional charge.
Increases the non-damaging effects of your weapon poisons by 20%.
Fatal attacks instead reduce you to 7% of your maximum health. For 3 sec afterward, you take 85% reduced damage. Cannot trigger more often than once per 6 min.
Reduces the cooldown of Sprint by 60 sec.
Movement speed increased by 15%.
Reduces the duration of movement slowing effects 30%.
Coats your weapons with a Non-Lethal Poison that lasts for 1 hour. Each strike has a 30% chance of poisoning the enemy, reducing their damage by 3.0% for 10 sec.
Increases the critical strike chance of your attacks that generate combo points by 5%.
Auto-attacks increase auto-attack damage and movement speed by 1.0% for 3 sec, stacking up to 10%.
Adds a Leeching effect to your Lethal poisons, granting you 3% Leech.
Critical strike chance increased by 1%. Critical strike damage bonus of your attacks that generate combo points increased by 10%.
Slice and Dice heals you for up to 1% of your maximum health per 3 sec.
Your finishing moves have a 10% chance per combo point to grant 1% Haste for 15 sec, stacking up to 5 times.
Increases your maximum Energy by 50 and Energy regeneration by 5%.

Roll the Bones supercharges 1 combo point.

Damaging finishing moves consume a supercharged combo point to function as if they spent 2 additional combo points.

Restore 100 Energy. Mastery increased by 14.4% for 6 sec.

When your Energy is reduced below 30, drink a Thistle Tea.
After consuming a supercharged combo point, your next Sinister Strike also strikes the target with an Echoing Reprimand dealing 142,357 Physical damage.

Gain 1 additional max combo point.

Your finishing moves that consume more than 5 combo points have increased effects, and your finishing moves deal 5% increased damage.

Coats your weapons with a Lethal Poison that lasts for 1 hour. Each strike has a 30% chance to poison the enemy for 99,290 Nature damage over 12 sec. Subsequent poison applications will instantly deal 10,007 Nature damage.
Shiv now also increases your Nature damage done against the target by 30% for 8 sec.

You regain 8 Energy each time your Garrote or Rupture deal Bleed damage to a poisoned target.

If an enemy dies while afflicted by your Rupture, you regain energy based on its remaining duration.
Increases the application chance of your weapon poisons by 5%.
Garrote and Rupture damage increased by 15%.
Critical strikes with attacks that generate combo points grant an additional combo point per critical strike.
Garrote deals 50% increased damage and has no cooldown when used from Stealth and for 12 sec after breaking Stealth.
Carve a deathmark into an enemy, dealing 465,577 Bleed damage over 16 sec. While marked your Garrote, Rupture, and Lethal poisons applied to the target are duplicated, dealing 100% of normal damage.
While above 50% of maximum Energy your Garrote, Rupture, and Crimson Tempest consume 2 Energy to duplicate 30% of any damage dealt.
Ambush and Mutilate cost 10 more Energy and deal 70% additional damage as Nature.
Your weapon poisons, Nature damage over time, and Bleed abilities deal 2% increased damage to targets for each weapon poison, Nature damage over time, and Bleed effect on them.
Versatility increased by 3%.
Garrote increases the damage of Ambush and Mutilate on the target by 20%.

Coats your weapons with a Lethal Poison that lasts for 1 hour. Each strike has a 30% chance to poison the enemy, dealing 9,758 Nature damage and applying Amplifying Poison for 12 sec. Envenom can consume 10 stacks of Amplifying Poison to deal 35% increased damage. Max 20 stacks.
Mutilate deals an additional 20% Bleed damage over 8 sec.
Ambush and Mutilate have a 15% chance to make your next Ambush free and usable without Stealth. Chance increased to 30% if the target is under 35% health.
Envenom's effect also increases the critical strike chance of your weapon poisons by 5%, and their critical strikes generate 1 Energy.
Garrote damage increased by 20%. Garrote generates 2 additional combo points when used from Stealth.

Embed a bone spike in the target, dealing 212,555 Physical damage and 21,079 Bleed damage every 2.5 sec until they die or leave combat. 

Refunds a charge when target dies.

Awards 1 combo point plus 1 additional per active bone spike.
Your Poisons and Bleeds deal 30% increased damage to targets below 35% health.
Envenom has a 8% chance per combo point spent to smash a vial of poison at the target's location, creating a pool of acidic death that deals 185,850 Nature damage over 2 sec to all enemies within it.
